page_dialog.title_speak_phase1: Speak a part in the dialogue
page_dialog.enable_mic: You have not configured your microphone. Enable now?
page_dialog.title_dictatechoice: Listen and choose the correct answer

page_dialog_speak.your_turn: Now it's your turn! Speak the sentences below.

pop_over.odd_solution: Your answer is grammatically correct and understandable, however, it would not be said this way by a native speaker.

review_info.title: What happened here? Let's have a look!
review_info.description: A word or phrase pending revision can move up or down a level depending on correct or incorrect review.
review_info.one_mistake_title: If only one mistake is made
review_info.one_mistake_1: the word or phrase stays at the same level
review_info.one_mistake_2: and it's made available for revision the following day.
review_info.more_mistakes_title: If more than one mistake is made
review_info.more_mistakes_2: and it's made available for revision immediately.
review_info.no_mistakes_2: it receives a new revision date (anything between 4 and 180 days, depending on the new level).

comprehension.text_title: Read and choose the correct answer
comprehension.audio_title: Listen and choose the correct answer

page_vocabulary.enable_mic: You have not configured your microphone. Enable now?

page_dictate.title: Listen and complete
page_dictate.choice_title: Listen and choose the correct answer

mic_modal.chrome: Using Google Chrome as your browser? Click "%{allow}" at the top of your browser window.
mic_modal.instruction: When you've selected which microphone to use and the checkmark appears, click "Continue".
mic_modal.no_mic: It appears you don't have a microphone connected to your computer. If you want Babbel to recognize your voice, attach a microphone and choose "Continue".
mic_modal.instruction_permission_rejected: Check your browser settings or start the lesson without the microphone.
mic_modal.title_permission_rejected: You haven't granted access to your microphone

speak_interface.help_instruction_1: Repeat the translation in your normal voice.
speak_interface.help_instruction_2: When you speak you should see the microphone icon fill up.
speak_interface.help_instruction_3: If the volume level is constantly below or above the microphone icon, please go to "Audio settings" and adjust the sensitivity of your microphone.

record_flash_manager.instructions_gain: Please say a couple of words into your microphone (e. g.: "I am testing my microphone!"). The volume display should reach the green area. If it's too high or too low please adjust the microphone sensitivity using the bar below.

vocabulary_speak.title: Listen and repeat
vocabulary_speak.enable_mic: You have not configured your microphone. Enable now?

page_keyboard.title: Learn a new letter
page_keyboard.transliteration_instruction: To type this letter on Babbel, press %{transliteration} on your keyboard:

review_end_screen.more_info_link: How does the review feature work?

flash_card_trainer.title: Do you remember these words in %{Italian}?

reload.title: There’s a problem loading your course

return.body: Please go back to the previous page and try again.
return.title: Sorry, there was a glitch

learning_tip.tip: Hear it loud and clear: Turn up the volume or use headphones.

lesson_settings.body: Speaking will help you improve your pronunciation.

positive.1: Wow! You make it seem easy 💁‍♀️
positive.4: Nice! You didn't miss a thing 👂

content_locked.text_access_content: Keep it up! Get access to all lessons and topics.

end_screen.body: You got %{count} out of %{totalCount} items correct
end_screen.title: Great work, %{username}!

review_menu.title: How would you like to review?

raf_popup.title: Give your friends a free month of Babbel and earn a reward!

error_generic_lesson.body: Please check your mic setup. Or continue without the microphone, and just listen.
error_generic_lesson.title: Sorry, we can’t hear you

error_generic_review.body: Please check your mic setup, or try a different review method.
error_generic_review.title: Sorry, we can’t hear you

error_mic_muted.body: Please unmute your mic in the sound settings on your computer.
error_mic_muted.cta: No thanks, I can’t speak now
error_mic_muted.title: Your mic is muted!

error_mic_permission.body: Press the recorder icon [*] in the Chrome browser address bar to allow access to your microphone.
error_mic_permission.cta: No thanks, I can’t speak now
error_mic_permission.title: Try turning on the mic!

negative.1: That's alright, it wasn't easy. Keep working on it 😊

positive.1: You made that sound easy! Nice 👍

feeling_silly.body: Speaking is a great way to improve your pronunciation. It might feel strange at first, but you'll get there.
feeling_silly.title: Feeling silly? We've all been there.

mic_button.tap_to_speak: Press and hold while you speak

mic_permission_review.body: To practice speaking, please click "Allow" in Chrome so we can use your microphone.

error_feedback.body: Please adjust your microphone in your settings
error_feedback.title: Sorry, we didn't catch that!
